channel.description: Let's Enjoy the Wisdom of Life.

item.title: Life Show-Fish Eye Camera Vacation Life
item.description:
💕 –Preview on Vicky’s drama opera–
📹 First Episode of Vicky’s Drama Opera

1️⃣ Vicky, a financial college student, lives a business life of business people every day, followed by DDL, and finally discovers the fact that Life is always hard
2️⃣ So after finishing her demonic life in her freshman year, she decided to set out to find herself, and the first step was to go home ✔ :
3️⃣ Before leaving, she remembered the fisheye camera used by her idol Kim Tae yeon, so she decided to use a second-hand camera
4️⃣ Record your departure from Beijing 🎇， Returning to high school and not preparing for future interviews on a trip home

Anyway, vacation is here!

item.title: Life Show-Struggle With Anxiety
item.description:
💕 –Preview on Vicky’s drama opera–
🌑Welcome Back,and this chapter is about dark moments

1️⃣ Financial college student Vicky woke up,looked back on the past year and found that most of the time it was pain 😭 Memories.
2️⃣ Youth Lost, Suspension of School, Entrepreneurship I have struggled with depression and recovered from it 、 The application collapsed and cried loudly 🤢 3️⃣ It seems that in the end, it was jokingly cured by the demon wind in Beijing 🙀
4️⃣ But who said they would become a better child after their birthday? However, who mentioned life and accidents again? I don’t know who came first 🫀

Anyway is better or worse, or has she lived past the age of 21? Let’s congratulate her together!

item.title: Life Show-So When Should We Start Our Plan For Life
item.description:
💕 –Preview on Vicky’s drama opera–
📚Welcome Back,and this chapter is about study

1️⃣ Heaven rewards diligence, we face increasingly complex life
2️⃣ Learning is still the quickest way for ordinary people to gain certain rewards
3️⃣ Don’t you want to become someone who has knowledge of various fields in life?
4️⃣ So, if you consider the learning process as an interesting journey to accept new knowledge, I think you can’t ignore the self-study room. Anyway, it’s best to treat yourself as a social anxiety and chat less with others to improve efficiency

Got any questions or video suggestions? Comment below and I’ll answer your questions in a future video.

item.title: Life Show-Twenty-Two!!!
item.description:
💕 –Preview on Vicky’s drama opera–
🎂 Welcome back and today is about 22nd birthday

1️⃣ Vicky, a financial college student, woke up and realized he was about 22 years old 👩🏻 Well, looking back on the past year, I found that most of the time it was pain 😭 Memories of
2️⃣ Youth Lost, Suspension of School, Entrepreneurship 🎆、 Depression Struggle Rehabilitation 😥、 The application collapsed and burst into tears 🤢， Finally, he was jokingly cured by the demon wind in Beijing 🙀
3️⃣ But who said they would become a better child after their birthday? However, who mentioned life and accidents again? I don’t know who came first 🫀

Anyway is better or worse, or has she lived past the age of 21? Let’s congratulate her together!

item.title: Life Show-Make Dish In Five Minutes
item.description:
💕 –Preview on Vicky’s drama opera–
🌱 Welcome Back,and life continues

1️⃣ Vicky thinks he eats three meals a day ✔️ It is indeed something that cannot be missed, after all, her favorite Han Zong is called this name
2️⃣ So it’s just a matter of shallow handling and recording 😥 Countless late night food videos in college that are slightly more healing 🎆
3️⃣ How have you been this summer? It doesn’t matter if it’s not good, after all, life won’t always be bad

Anyway, today is another day of hard work, what a delightful thing it is

item.title: Talk Deeper-Life Show Life Principles That I Would Make To Youngsters
item.description:
💕 –Preview on Vicky’s drama opera–
🧠 Let’s talk about Deeper Psychological Comments

1️⃣ Feel busy everyday?
2️⃣ Still find your life meaningless?
3️⃣ Lose direction for the adult’s life?
4️⃣ Hold these 3 principles and keep practicing
5️⃣ Every better life starts little by litte

So this video is mainly about the rhythm and mindset that must not be missed

item.title: Learning New Thing-First Introduction
item.description:
💕 –Preview on Vicky’s Learning-New-Things-Together Show–
📺 This is the first episode of this Series~~

1️⃣ How to Spend the Life Platform Period..
🥇Skill Chapter：Language Learning、Financial Knowledge、Hand Make Up、Tarot
🥇Life Chapter：Internship for the First Time、Going to the Big City for the First Time、Joining in the Next Generation’s Social Party for the First Time

So sometimes your life just needs one click so start to learn one new tiny thing everyday from now on

item.title: Life Show-Wandering in Life
item.description:
💕 –Preview on Vicky’s drama opera–
🌞 we start to talk about life~~

1️⃣ Sometimes just one space of life seems hard..
2️⃣ How to balance life and the work?
3️⃣ How to make the best decision for yourself??

The inspiration of this video comes from Past Lives,which tells the story of Nora and Hae Sung, two childhood friends who lose touch after Nora’s family emigrate from South Korea. 20 later, they reunite and deal with the ideas of love and destiny .

item.title: Life Show-So We Choose To Go To The Moon
item.description:
💕 –Preview on Vicky’s drama opera–
🌍 we start to talk about universe~~

1️⃣ Sometimes just one step out of our comfort zone will bring everthing different.
2️⃣ What does this mean to human beings?
3️⃣ Just step out of our comfort living Earth?

You could find more related information about X Academy here
